original_title: Woody Woodpecker and Friends Halloween Favorites
overview: Created by cartoonist Walter Lantz, the Halloween favorites include 7 spooky cartoon adventures. Woody ªs friends include Chilly Willy, Oswald the Lucky Rabbit, Wally Walrus, Buzz Buzzard, and more. The theatrical shorts include:  Monster of Ceremonies  Franken-Stymied  Phantom of the Horse Opera  Witch Crafty  Wax Works
title: Woody Woodpecker and Friends Halloween Favorites
